# AgentPlane LLM Discovery Index

canonical: https://agentplane.org
updated: 2026-02-18

## Product Narrative

AgentPlane is a repository-native CLI workflow for agent-driven execution with explicit policy gates.
The system is designed for deterministic planning, verification, and traceable closure in git-based projects.

## Primary Entry Points

- https://agentplane.org/
- https://agentplane.org/docs
- https://agentplane.org/blog

- https://agentplane.org/docs/user/overview

- https://agentplane.org/docs/user/commands
- https://agentplane.org/docs/user/configuration
- https://agentplane.org/docs/user/website-ia
